title: Pacifica Body Products French Metro Sans
content:
The sans underneath Pacifica looks like a smoothed out version of URW Metropolitaines inspired of the subway type of old Paris. At first I though it was just a secondary logo but this type is consistent across the entire product line.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/metropolitaines/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070318062711/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/metropolitaines/)

[http://www.pacificacandles.com/body.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20070318062711/http:/www.pacificacandles.com/body.asp)

Thanks for helpin’ a brotha’ out,

Mike Diaz :o)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/body-photostrip_5796.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/pacificafrench_5774.jpg)
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content: It’s really hard to see what’s going on here. [Orange](http://web.archive.org/web/20070318062711/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=ITC.10148.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=NEROLA&sampleSize=48)? [Green](http://web.archive.org/web/20070318062711/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=ITC.10142.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=NEROLA&sampleSize=48)?

Its not Orange.

There are very few really great/large images on the Pacifica candles website.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/soap-tahitian-gardenia_4774.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/body-sandalwood_5183.jpg)

The face in question does not have the eccentric modulation of Green, Orange- or even Pink (the entire Timothy Donaldson color series). In fact its very smooth.

Mikey :-)

Based on the R and G it looks like Gill Sans with an altered S.  
But that could be my eyes.

Tim

_[Edit: it was my eyes, ignore that totally, I found a better image here]_  
 [http://www.standardstyle.com/Zoom.aspx?ProductId=42621&ProductStyleId=106104](http://web.archive.org/web/20070318062711/http:/www.standardstyle.com/Zoom.aspx?ProductId=42621&ProductStyleId=106104)
Has someone butchered Friz Quadrata? Typophile is not letting me insert an image to illustrate.
Still can’t insert image. Is there a problem?

No problem here Nick.  
RGB 430x336px .jpg

Do you have Flash installed?

Tim

Tim thank you for posting a really large image. I couldn’t find one like that.

Too bad no one has seen this before… it may just be custom/exclusive typeface.

Mikey :-(

Nick Job\> when you upload a file, it cannot have any spaces in the file name.  
 :-)

![](http://web.archive.org/files/Zan1_4339.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/Zan2_6168.jpg)
  
It’s working again.  
See what I mean about Friz Quadrata? I know it’s not but it may have been an inspriration.
